It is far better to win a battle through skilled leadership and wise decisions than violence and bloodshed. It may not seem as glorious to the uninitiated, but in the end it results in fewer wounds--of any kind.

the most improper job of any man, even saints (who at any rate were at least unwilling to take it on), is bossing other men. Not one in a million is fit for it, and least of all those who seek the opportunity.

contents.item: Politics is a matter of leading other people. Admittedly not where they want to go, but where they ought to go.
It takes courage with true humility and steadfastness to win confidence and admiration
In a world devoid of towering political leaders, we seem to have become experts at growing idiots & elevating them to important positions.
His supporters will push him to disaster unless his opponents show where the dangers are.
Power is given to those who reach to take it & claimed by those who will stop at nothing to fulfill what they believe is their birthright.

... The political leader must constantly appraise and reappraise the means through which 'he can hope to do justice to the responsibility that power imposes upon him' while at the same time pursuing political values with conviction.

contents.item: In my view, leadership is the courage to take risks in defense of a position that is both legal and moral. The politician who tries to become a wise guy by becoming friends to everybody - corrupt or not - is not a leader.
contents.owner: Miriam Defensor Santiago, Stupid is Forever

contents.item: It's beneficial to have a reputation for honesty, if only so that one can lie at crucial moments.

It is a curious thing, Harry, but perhaps those who are best suited to power are those who have never sought it. Those who, like you, have leadership thrust upon them, and take up the mantle because they must, and find to their own surprise that they wear it well.
contents.owner: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

contents.item: Don't follow the crowd, let the crowd follow you.
The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
Leadership is not about titles, positions or flowcharts. It is about one life influencing another.
If your actions create a legacy that inspires others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, then, you are an excellent leader.

Don’t waste your energy trying to educate or change opinions; go over, under, through, and opinions will change organically when you’re the boss. Or they won’t. Who cares? Do your thing, and don’t care if they like it.

Power isn’t control at all — power is strength, and giving that strength to others. A leader isn’t someone who forces others to make him stronger; a leader is someone willing to give his strength to others that they may have the strength to stand on their own.
Only one man in a thousand is a leader of men -- the other 999 follow women.
